Upgrades.Name: Potent Enzymes
Upgrades.Description: Excrete more potent enzymes (such as amylase and proteinases) from the stylet, allowing more efficient plany sap extraction.

Upgrades.Name: Sharper maxillae
Upgrades.Description: The maxillae (along with the mandibles) form the "stylet", and are used to pierce tissues and other materials, allowing for the injection of enzymes to break down food. Allows you the break harder materials.

Upgrades.Name: Hibernation
Upgrades.Description: Able to enter a hibernation state, allowing you to survive the night outside of the colony

Upgrades.Name: Appendicular Muscles
Upgrades.Description: Stronger leg muscles allow you to tunnel quickly in a direction
